titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: The weather was deplorable throughout the day. The Archdeacon came to lunch, and afterwards attended the Committee of the Diocesan Board of Missions, over which I presided â€“ a very unreal & lifeless affair. Norcock was reported down with influenza again. He is a refugee with his fiancée.
